req1: partial supervision shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: route unsuitability shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: actual speed shall still be shown on the dmi
req2: information shall be shown on the dmi

req1: on lines fitted with rbc the etcs trainborne equipment shall be able to transmit the location of the entire train to the rbc
req2: the etcs trainborne equipment shall transmit its own train identification to the rbc

req1: the current application level shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: the emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi

req1: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: operation of the train trip shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: on request of the rbc the driver shall have the possibility to confirm that the track ahead of him until the end of the on sight section is clear
req2: on demand the position of the front end of the train at the time of the demand shall be indicated on the dmi this shall be possible while the train is moving or stationary

req1: the driver shall be able to override the function when the train is stationary
req2: the driver shall be able to use the reversing function without needing to re-confirm the train data

req1: the on board shall be capable of sending train data to the trackside after confirmation by the driver or when entering the rbc area
req2: the following train data shall be sent from the on board to the trackside

req1: partial supervision shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: actual speed shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: partial supervision shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: route unsuitability shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: actual speed shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: route unsuitability shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: the etcs trainborne equipment shall be capable of supervising the following operational states
req2: the etcs trainborne equipment shall be capable of being isolated

req1: this ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver
req2: the supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi

req1: this ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver
req2: the train shall as a minimum be supervised to a ceiling speed; the supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver

req1: the driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving
req2: the driver shall be able to confirm the train integrity to the rbc manually the confirmation requires the train to be stationary

req1: the current operational status shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi
req2: the supervised shunting speed shall be indicated to the driver on request

req1: this ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver
req2: the target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver

req1: the driver shall be able to select train data entry on the dmi
req2: the emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi

req1: the emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi
req2: when the plain text message appears on the dmi the driver shall be alerted

req1: the driver shall be able to override the function when the train is stationary
req2: after the acknowledgement the driver shall be able to continue the movement

req1: on demand the position of the front end of the train at the time of the demand shall be indicated on the dmi this shall be possible while the train is moving or stationary
req2: the occurrence of a failure shall be displayed on the dmi

req1: if the train or the shunting movement exceeds the permitted ceiling speed by a certain harmonised margin the trainborne equipment shall execute a brake intervention until the actual speed does not exceed permitted speed; then the driver shall be able to release the brake
req2: if decided by a national value the driver may release the etcs emergency brake when the actual speed is below the permitted speed

req1: the driver shall be able to select train data entry on the dmi
req2: the driver shall be able to confirm the train integrity to the rbc manually the confirmation requires the train to be stationary

req1: the emergency brake shall be applied until the traction unit is stationary
req2: when the traction unit is stationary the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition this acknowledgement will release the emergency brake

req1: the emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi
req2: the driver shall be able to confirm the train integrity to the rbc manually the confirmation requires the train to be stationary

req1: the train shall as a minimum be supervised to a ceiling speed; the supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver
req2: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: the supervised shunting speed shall be indicated to the driver on request
req2: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: the release speed shall be indicated on the dmi
req2: the roll away/reverse movement intervention shall be indicated on the dmi

req1: the test shall require no action on the part of the driver
req2: on request of the rbc the driver shall have the possibility to confirm that the track ahead of him until the end of the on sight section is clear
